content: That said our Op expense compares to the Q4 ‘21 period of $26.1 million, the increase being related to both non-recurring G&A items, and as expected increased expenses associated with an increased sales force to optimize 2022 customer acquisition opportunities. In regard to operating expense guidance, we are guiding 2022 GAAP operating expense to be $105 million to $109 million, representing an increase of 15% to 20%, compared to GAAP operating expense of $90.7 million in 2021.
